en: Jehovah, remember for David All his affliction;
hmr: LALPA, David chu a rinumtuorna po po Hrietpui la.

en: How he sware unto Jehovah, And vowed unto the Mighty One of Jacob:
hmr: LALPA kuoma ṭawng inkhâma, Jakob Mi Hrât kuoma thu a tiemzie kha:

en: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, Nor go up into my bed;
hmr: “Ka umna inah lût dêr naw ning a, Ka khumah kai bawk naw ning a.

en: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, Or slumber to mine eyelids;
hmr: Ka mithai hi insîm phal naw ning a, Ka mit vunhai hi insîm phal bawk naw ning ah.

en: Until I find out a place for Jehovah, A tabernacle for the Mighty One of Jacob.
hmr: LALPA hmun ding ka zawng suok hmakhat chun, Jakob Mi Hrât umna ding chu,” tiin.

en: Lo, we heard of it in Ephrathah: We found it in the field of the wood.
hmr: Ngai ta, a thu chu Ephrathaah kan hriet a, Rampui phûla chun kan hmu tah a.

en: We will go into his tabernacles; We will worship at his footstool.
hmr: Ama umnaahai chun lût ei ta, A ke innghatna bula chun chibai bûk ei tih.

en: Arise, O Jehovah, into thy resting-place; Thou, and the ark of thy strength.
hmr: Aw LALPA, tho la, i châwl hmun dinga chun lût rawh, Nang le i hrâtna bâwm leh.

en: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; And let thy saints shout for joy.
hmr: I thiempuhai chu felnain inthuom sienla, I mi inthienghai chu hlimin khêk raw hai se.

en: For thy servant David’s sake Turn not away the face of thine anointed.
hmr: I siehlaw David leiin, I hriek nâl hmêl chu innghat kîrtir naw rawh.

en: Jehovah hath sworn unto David in truth; He will not turn from it: Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
hmr: LALPA chun David kuomah thutakin ṭawng ân khâm tah a, Chu chu nghatsan naw nih. “I taksa raa mi i lalṭhungphaa chun inṭhungtir ka ta;

en: If thy children will keep my covenant And my testimony that I shall teach them, Their children also shall sit upon thy throne for evermore.
hmr: I nauhai chun ka thuthlung le, Ka thuinhriettir, anni ka lân chûktir ding chu, an zâwm chun, An nauhai khawm kumkhawtluongin i lalṭhungphaa chun ṭhung pei an tih,” tiin.

en: For Jehovah hath chosen Zion; He hath desired it for his habitation.
hmr: LALPA chun Zion chu a thlang sih a; A umna dingin a dit a nih.

en: This is my resting-place for ever: Here will I dwell; for I have desired it.
hmr: “Hi hi kumkhuoa dinga ka châwl hmun ding a nih, Hitaka hin um zing ka tih, ka nuom zâwng a ni sih a.

en: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.
hmr: A fâk ding chu malsâwm rei rui ka ta, A mi rimsihai chu beiin sukkhawp ka tih.

en: Her priests also will I clothe with salvation; And her saints shall shout aloud for joy.
hmr: A thiempuhai chu sandamnain inthuom ka ta, A mi inthienghai chu hlimin khêk khêk an tih.

en: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.
hmr: Chutaka chun David ki chu inder suoktir ka ta, Ka hriek nâl ta ding chun khâwnvar ka ruot tah a.

en: His enemies will I clothe with shame; But upon himself shall his crown flourish.
hmr: Ama dotuhai chu muolphonain inthuom ka ta, Ama chunga ruok chun a lallu- khum chu tle sur a tih,” tiin.
